IÃ‚Â´d like to introduce myself here since i want to participate on this forum asking questions, helping other users, making suggestions... You know, all that good stuff .

IÃ‚Â´ve been playing KSP quite a while now, IÃ‚Â´ve managed to achieve a stable orbit on Kerbin, Mun, Minmus, Eve and Duna, although I cant for the love of god make a base on any planet whatsoever.

My biggest project so far is the Providence Space Station, which im currently working on. IÃ‚Â´ll post some pics later. Oh and one last thing: I love mods
Hello Killstr3aks. Welcome to the forum.

Hello there. I am also a big fan of mods, having an entire separate KSP installation for them, including KAS, KJR, KWRocketry, B9Aerospace, Kethane, and a few others. Only one mod which I would never, ever use: Mechjeb. I can fly my own damn ships just fine, thank you!

But don't let the mods ruin your experience. They are great and all, but the real fun of KSP is seeing something that you made entirely by yourself flying into the air and doing exactly what you wanted it do.

So, have fun on the forums!
